text:
e="preserve">Denise Nickerson (April 1, 1957 – July 10, 2019) was an American former actress, singer, and accountant. She played Violet in "Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory" in 1971. She played Allison on season 2 of "The Electric Company" in 1972-1973.
Nickerson died on July 10, 2019 from a seizure caused by pneumonia at a hospital in Aurora, Colorado at the age of 62.

annotations.surface_form: Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory
